name: elm-hn
description: A simple hacker news client implemented in Elm

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/elm-static-html --filename src/Static/Index.elm --output app/www/index.html && node support/add-doctype.js app/www/index.html && node support/copy-js.js js/setup.js app/www/setup.js && elm-make src/Main.elm --output=app/www/app.js

author: Martin Feineis
